articles.title: Racist memes shared by Navy SEALs prompt investigation, disciplinary actions
articles.full_text: WASHINGTON (AP) — Two Navy SEALs based in Virginia are facing disciplinary action for racist conduct, and several of their platoon and team leaders ...
